title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Flipped Learning for Science Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Pre-learning via individual mobile devices followed by collaborative in-person sessions to solve scientific practical problems.

learning_goals: Learners autonomously acquire three or more science theories per week using mobile microlearning materials in a flipped learning environment.
Learners collaborate with peers during face-to-face sessions to complete one practical science project (e.g., experimental design analysis).
Learners demonstrate science problem-solving skills with an achievement rate of over 80% through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
